ReadonlyMode.Name: Readonly Mode
ReadonlyMode.Tip: Another program is using the Environment files. So this program run in readonly mode.

NewVersion.Title: New Version
NewVersion.Content: New version is now available for Sims Environment Operator. Click on Update Button to update.

Worlds.List: These are all the worlds this program can work with:

Environment.ProtectedTip: It's a protected environment, please do not delete it!
Environment.RestartForLanguage: You need to restart this program to show these environments in new language.

Operator.WeatherDescription: All Weathers has the instances of Fogy, Rainy, Snowy...

MultiDocuments.Title: Documents
MultiDocuments.Content: More than one saves are in your document. Choose the one you are playing:

SimsDir.Title: Sims Folder
SimsDir.Content:
Sorry but we could not get The Sims 3 folder. You may have to set it manually.
Please Select the root folder of The Sims 3:
SimsDir.Invalid: It is not the correct folder of The Sims 3.

CloseSave.Title: Save Changes
CloseSave.Content: You have changed the environment. Would you like to save them?

ReadEnvironmentError.Title: Adding Failed
ReadEnvironmentError.Content: One or more environments are not been added:
ReadEnvironmentError.ExistedError: A same environment has been installed, we cannot install it again.
ReadEnvironmentError.InvalidError: It's not a valid environment file.
ReadEnvironmentError.UnknownError: Sorry, we could not read this file correctly. Installation is canceled.

DeleteEnvironment.Title: Delete
DeleteEnvironment.Error: An error occured when deleting environment.

ExportEnvironment.EmptyName: You have not typed the name.
ExportEnvironment.InvalidName: These ({0}) should not be in a name.
ExportEnvironment.EmptyCreator: You have not typed the creator.
ExportEnvironment.InvalidCreator: These ({0}) should not be in a creator name.
ExportEnvironment.EmptyPath: You have not set a path to share you environment.
ExportEnvironment.CustomPathForbidden: You cannot set your share in the program folder.
ExportEnvironment.InvalidPath: We could not find this path.

DefaultEnvironment.Title: Default
DefaultEnvironment.Okay: {1} of {0} has been set to default.
DefaultEnvironment.Failed: {1} of {0} cannot be set to default. The preinstalled environment may be lost.

Backup.Name: Backup
Backup.Creator: this program
Backup.Description:
This is a backup environment, and it is created in {0}.
It will be auto-deleted when the program close.

Sky_Sky.Name: Sky
Sky_Sky.Description: You can change the color of the sun, sky, and horizon here.

SunColor.Name: Sun Color
SunColor.Description: The color of sun contains two parts: the sun itself, and the halo.

HaloColor.Name: Halo Color
HaloColor.Description: You can cahnge the color of halo here.

Sky_Sea.Name: Sea
Sky_Sea.Description: You can change the color of water (sea, river,lake and pool) here.

SunMoonColor.Name: Water Reflection Color
SunMoonColor.Description: Water color reflected from the light from the sun and moon

Sky_1.Name: Cloud A
Sky_1.Description: You can change the color of Cloud A here.

ColorWRTSunDark.Name: Cloud1 without Sunlight
ColorWRTSunDark.Description: The the color of cloud without sunlight

ColorWRTSunLight.Name: Cloud with Sunlight
ColorWRTSunLight.Description: The the color of cloud with sunlight

ColorWRTHorizonDark.Name: Cloud at Horizon without Sunlight
ColorWRTHorizonDark.Description: The color of cloud1 at horizon without sunlight

ColorWRTHorizonLight.Name: Cloud at Horizon with Sunlight
ColorWRTHorizonLight.Description: The color of cloud1 at horizon with sunlight

ColorWRTShadow.Name: Cloud1 Shadow
ColorWRTShadow.Description: The color of the cloud's shadow

Sky_2.Name: Cloud B
Sky_2.Description: You can change the color of Cloud B here.

ColorWRTSunDark.Name: Cloud1 without Sunlight
ColorWRTSunDark.Description: The the color of cloud without sunlight

ColorWRTSunLight.Name: Cloud with Sunlight
ColorWRTSunLight.Description: The the color of cloud with sunlight

ColorWRTHorizonDark.Name: Cloud at Horizon without Sunlight
ColorWRTHorizonDark.Description: The color of cloud1 at horizon without sunlight

ColorWRTHorizonLight.Name: Cloud at Horizon with Sunlight
ColorWRTHorizonLight.Description: The color of cloud1 at horizon with sunlight

ColorWRTShadow.Name: Cloud1 Shadow
ColorWRTShadow.Description: The color of the cloud's shadow

Sky_Light.Name: Light
Sky_Light.Description: The light's color of both sun and moon.

SunMoonLight.Name: Sun and Moon Light
SunMoonLight.Description: The color of sunlght and moonlight

AmbientSkyTop.Name: Ambient Sky Top
AmbientSkyTop.Description: The color of reflection on the top in night

AmbientSkyBottom.Name: Ambient Sky Bottom
AmbientSkyBottom.Description: The color of reflection at the bottom in night
